ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISPICKVAL(Department__c ,"Staffing")), RecordTypeId ='012G00000014QHc', OR(ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Other"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Accounting"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Advertising"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Automotive"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Banks"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Clubs"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Commercial Recycling"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Consumer Brands"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Cosmetic Surgery"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Enterprise B2B"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Financial Recruiting"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Mobile Cleansing"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Outsourced HR"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Restaurants"), ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Uniforms")), OR(ISBLANK( What_does_the_prospect_sell__c ) , ISBLANK( What_makes_you_different__c ) , ISBLANK( How_much_does_your_serviceproduct_cost__c ) , ISBLANK( What_is_the_sweet_spot__c ) , ISBLANK( What_industry_areas_are_we_targeting__c ) , ISBLANK( Is_the_list_in_Excel_with_phone_numbers__c ) , ISBLANK( What_is_their_close_rate_on_cold_calls__c ) , ISBLANK( Are_they_requesting_anything_special__c ) , ISBLANK( Do_they_understand_what_they_are_buying__c ) , ISBLANK( What_will_make_this_a_long_term_partner__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Must Fill Out All Fields in the "Other Client Information" Section
